name: Fuel Runner
description:
Controls- 

Move with w a s d or the arrow keys

Right click to dash

Space to jump

This was made for the ScoreSpace 20 game jam. I didn't have any time to add sound or fix bugs so there may be some problems in the game. This was also the first time I tried loot locker and tried to set it up in the last hour but couldn't get it to work.
